TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripControlHost extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem

summary.span: 裝載 (Host) 自訂控制項或 Windows Form 控制項。

span.span: Hosts custom controls or Windows Forms controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是抽象的基底類別，如， ，和。 is the abstract base class for , , and . 裝載其他控制項，包括自訂控制項，有兩種： can host other controls, including custom controls, in two ways: - 建構與衍生自類別。Construct a with a class that derives from . 若要完整存取裝載的控制項和屬性，您必須轉換回到實際屬性類別它代表。To fully access the hosted control and properties, you must cast the property back to the actual class it represents. - 擴充，並繼承的類別預設建構函式中呼叫基底類別建構函式的類別衍生自傳遞。Extend , and in the inherited class's default constructor, call the base class constructor passing a class that derives from . 此選項可讓您包裝通用控制項的方法和屬性中的輕鬆存取。This option lets you wrap common control methods and properties for easy access in a . 使用裝載您的自訂的控制項或任何其他 Windows Form 控制項的類別。Use the class to host your customized controls or any other Windows Forms control. 若要自訂，衍生自並建立自訂的實作。To customize a , derive from and create a custom implementation. 您可以如覆寫方法來處理事件引發所裝載的控制項，並置於屬性來強化裝載的控制項的自訂功能。You can override methods such as to handle events raised by the hosted controls, and you can put custom functionality into properties to enhance the hosted control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構與控制，請使用來處理事件，而且已公開它的某些成員至。The following code example demonstrates constructing a with a control, using to handle events, and exposing some of its members to the . [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost/CPP/form1.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost/CS/form1.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost/VB/form1.vb#13)]

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property DefaultSize As Size
protected: virtual property System::Drawing::Size DefaultSize { System::Drawing::Size get(); };

summary.span: 取得控制項的預設大小。

span.span: Gets the default size of the control.
The default of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性代表最初建立時的控制項。The property represents the of the control when it is initially created. 如果是`true`，控制項的大小調整為自動根據方向。If is `true`, the control is sized automatically in accordance with the orientation. 您可以手動調整控制項大小藉由設定其屬性值設定為`false`。You can manually adjust the size of the control by setting its property value to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 為了維護更佳的效能，您不應將其建構函式中的控制項。In order to maintain better performance, you should not set the of a control in its constructor. 慣用的方法是覆寫屬性。The preferred method is to override the property.

span.para: 在覆寫衍生類別中的屬性，最好是傳回所需的維度，而不是覆寫所有的實作。
When overriding the property in a derived class, it is preferable to return a with the desired dimensions rather than overriding all the implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需有關和，請參閱 [清理 Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 上和 [覆寫 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Enter As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於輸入裝載控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the hosted control is entered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ToolStripControlHost1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripControlHost1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#569](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#569)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#569](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#569)]

summary.span: 發生於按下並按住按鍵且焦點在裝載控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when a key is pressed and held down while the hosted control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ToolStripControlHost1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripControlHost1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnBoundsChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 發生於 屬性變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnEnter(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed

abstract member OnEnter : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnEnter : EventArgs -> unit

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫新增或避免同步處理控制項事件的方法。Override the method to add or prevent the synchronizing of control events. 如果您覆寫並連結這裡事件時，會將它們攔截使用方法。If you override and hook up events here, unhook them by using the method. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定事件裝載的控制項所公開的事件處理。The following code example demonstrates how to set up event handling for an event exposed by the hosted control. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost/CPP/form1.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost/CS/form1.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost/VB/form1.vb#14)]

When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Unsubscribes events from the hosted control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫方法來取消訂閱事件訂閱中。Override the method to unsubscribe events subscribed in . 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何公開裝載控制項的事件取消訂閱。The following code example demonstrates how to unsubscribe from an event exposed by the hosted control. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost/CPP/form1.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost/CS/form1.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost/VB/form1.vb#15)]

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構控制項，並設定數個屬性。The following code example demonstrates constructing a control and setting several properties. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的名為`toolStrip1`呼叫`InitializeDateTimePickerHost`從表單的建構函式或`Load`事件處理常式。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `toolStrip1` and call `InitializeDateTimePickerHost` from the form's constructor or the `Load` event handler. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Validated As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於裝載控制項成功驗證之後。

span.span: Occurs after the hosted control has been successfully validated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ToolStripControlHost1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripControlHost1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#577](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#577)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#577](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#577)]
